ComicInfo.Title: The Sandman Cometh!; I Dared Enter the Haunted Forest!; It Fell From the Flying Saucer!; The Thing From the Hidden Swamp; In the Shadow of Tragg -- He Who Walks Beneath the Earth!
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Sandman Cometh!: A family stumbles across a hostile alien made of sand. The military are helpless, but it is defeated by the familyâ€™s bookish son, who uses water to dissolve it and traps it in a bucket.
I Dared Enter the Haunted Forest!: A bigoted rich man buys a cursed forest, unconcerned with the misfortunes that befall the village. The forest's keeper takes him to another dimension, explaining that he was looking for a man who no one would miss to display in the alien zoo.
It Fell From the Flying Saucer!: An artist finds an alien pencil that will make whatever he draws real, but his selfish use of it makes the aliens take it back.
The Thing From the Hidden Swamp: A plain girl helps a stranded alien, and is made beautiful as a reward.
In the Shadow of Tragg -- He Who Walks Beneath the Earth!: Reporter David Arnstead investigates the shut-down of a New York City subway line and finds Tragg, a subterranean monster that kills anything human it encounters.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-24 19:41:30. [CVDB46622] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:47:52. [Issue ID 63599]
